title: Sources: Durant to Rockets in blockbuster trade
content: The Suns have agreed to trade Kevin Durant to the Rockets for Jalen Green, Dillon Brooks, the No. 10 pick in this year's draft and five second-round picks, sources told ESPN.

title: Haliburton's early exit deflates Pacers in Game 7
content: Pacers star Tyrese Haliburton was helped off the court in the first quarter of Game 7 with what his father told ESPN is an Achilles injury.

title: Durant deal, Haliburton injury shake up title odds
content: The Rockets' trade for Kevin Durant and the injury suffered by the Pacers' Tyrese Haliburton shook up the early odds to win next season's NBA title, but the clear-cut favorite remains the champion Thunder.

title: Poch awed by U.S. leader Tillman: 'What a player'
content: United States manager Mauricio Pochettino said he was pleased to see his team deliver a "professional performance" in defeating Haiti 2-1 in the Concacaf Gold Cup.

title: N.Y. Jets owner buys stake in Crystal Palace team
content: New York Jets owner Woody Johnson has agreed on a £190 million deal ($254m) to buy a 43% stake in Premier League team Crystal Palace from American businessman John Textor, the club announced on Monday.

title: LSU chases Coastal, wins 2nd MCWS in 3 years
content: LSU knocked previously unbeaten Coastal Carolina ace Jacob Morrison out of the game with a four-run fourth inning, and the Tigers won their second national championship in three years Sunday with a 5-3 victory in the Men's College World Series finals.

title: Lukas in hospital, won't return to training horses
content: Hall of Famer D. Wayne Lukas, 89, has been hospitalized and won't return to training horses. His horses have been transferred to assistant Sebastian "Bas" Nicholl.

title: Brady wins inaugural Fanatics Games, $1M prize
content: Tom Brady emerged Sunday as the winner of the inaugural Fanatics Games, which pitted athletes and celebrities against fans in eight competitions this weekend at Fanatics Fest in New York.

title: ⚾ Redrafting MLB draft top 10 picks, 2015-24
content: Witt over Rutschman? Does Skenes still go No. 1? Let's go back in time to right the wrongs of the past 10 MLB drafts.

title: Grading the deal: Houston goes all-in, but did Phoenix get enough?
content: The Suns and Rockets have agreed to a deal that lands Kevin Durant in Houston. Which side won the trade?

title: We have new predictions in our 59-pick mock draft: Risers, fallers and latest intel
content: Will the 76ers, Hornets and Jazz take best-player-available approaches? We project both rounds of the NBA draft.

title: Ohtani's return, Devers' arrival and a fiery feud: What we know right now about NL's wild West
content: The most dynamic division in baseball has been tons of fun so far. After 17 games in 18 days, here are five lessons.

title: Why 'treatment of families' matters to NFL players -- and where some teams fall short
content: From the Vikings (A+) to the Bengals (F-), we asked players what the expectations are in team treatment of their families.

title: Buzz: How Blackhawks, Isles, Predators could shake up first round
content: The first round is Friday. Our reporters pass along the latest intel they're hearing from around the league.

title: USMNT completes 'perfect' group stage that was anything but
content: Mauricio Pochettino's USMNT made it three-for-three in the Gold Cup group stage, but there is clearly plenty still to work on for the Americans.

title: Echeverri shows he can shine for Man City, Alonso gets first Madrid win
content: Claudio Echeverri's 45-minute cameo has given Pep Guardiola plenty to think about, while Xabi Alonso got his first win as Real Madrid coach. Here's what you need to know from Sunday's Club World Cup action.

title: Every Premier League VAR mistake revealed: Find out the winners and losers
content: Which Premier League clubs got the worst of the VAR gaffes? Which actually benefited from mistakes? We've got all the answers with the official stats.

title: Costa Rica draws with Mexico, meets U.S. in last 8
content: Mexico drew 0-0 with Costa Rica on Sunday night at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas to win Group A of the CONCACAF Gold Cup and will play Saudi Arabia in the quarterfinals.

title: Source: Pogba to join Monaco on two-year deal
content: Former Manchester United and Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba will sign for Ligue 1 side AS Monaco, a source told ESPN.

title: Bellingham loving 'amazing' Alonso ideas for Real
content: Jude Bellingham praised Xabi Alonso's "amazing ideas" after Real Madrid overcame an early red card to beat Pachuca 3-1 in the Club World Cup on Sunday, while confirming that he'll undergo shoulder surgery when the tournament is over.

title: Echeverri, Cherki score 1st City goals in CWC romp
content: Ilkay Gundogan scored two goals as Manchester City comfortably dispatched Emirati club Al Ain 6-0 on Sunday to ease into the knockout stage of the Club World Cup from Group G along with Juventus.

title: Miami, on brink of knockouts, overcoming 'doubts'
content: Inter Miami CF head coach Javier Mascherano said the club continues to defy expectations at the Club World Cup after the 2-1 victory over FC Porto in its second group stage game, despite critics doubting the team's abilities ahead of the tournament.

title: Three dead, 70 injured in Algeria stadium fall
content: Three spectators died and more than 70 others were injured after falling from the upper stand of a stadium following MC Alger's Algerian top-flight title win.

title: Deco: Williams shows 'strong desire' to join Barça
content: Barcelona sporting director Deco has said that Spain winger Nico Williams is "showing a strong desire" to make the move to the Camp Nou.

title: 'Awesome feeling': Chase Briscoe edges Denny Hamlin at Pocono
content: Chase Briscoe, driving the No. 19 Toyota, returned to victory lane on Sunday at Pocono Raceway, conserving fuel down the stretch to hold off Joe Gibbs Racing teammate Denny Hamlin for his first win with his new race team, and his first overall since 2024.

title: Okamoto: Jon Jones' MMA résumé isn't ruined by not fighting Tom Aspinall
content: No, the last chapter of Jon Jones' UFC career doesn't negate his legacy, yet it does add a "but" to the end.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United linked with Kean swoop
content: Manchester United want to sign a striker and are looking at Fiorentina's Moise Kean. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Poor state of service roads: private bus operators go on token strike in Vadakara
content: They also threatened to launch an indefinite strike from June 27 if the issues were not resolved in time

title: Left questions U.S., Israel justification that Iran is developing nuclear weapons
content: CPI(M), CPI and SUCI(C) criticise move aimed at destabilising West Asia and asserting Western dominance over the region’s strategic resources

title: Roadside park to come up along Rettai Vaikal
content: The small open space along the channel had become an eyesore because of indiscriminate dumping of garbage and dense growth of weeds

title: Supreme Court’s 3-year Bar experience rule for judge exam triggers concern among aspirants
content: Review petitioners urge phased implementation, citing feasibility, and overlooked aspects of the Shetty Commission Report

title: Minister Boseraju’s public service is unparalleled, says Speaker
content: A book, Chaitanya Sagar, written to honour Boseraju capturing his political and public life, released to mark his birth anniversary

title: People will not tolerate if you belittle opposition, Kharge tells PM Modi
content: He alleged that while the entire nation and the armed forces worked in unison to defend the country, some individuals tried to take personal credit.

title: Man held on charge of misappropriation of mortgaged property following bank’s complaint
content: The man was accused of transferring the ownership of the mortgaged property to his wife’s name for taking a fresh loan from another bank

title: AI plane crash: Metal rods from past surgeries, procedures helped identify charred bodies, says MLA
content: When relatives started pouring in, they were asked to provide basic details about the victims. The characteristics noted down while tagging the bodies helped in matching the DNA of some victims, making the process easier," he said.

title: Focus is on skill development and job creation, says Dinakar
content: Andhra Pradesh government is working for creating 20 lakh jobs in five years, says 20-Point Programme Chairperson

title: ‘Farm fests’ to be held at Kerala Agriculture department farms
content: Farm produce unique to each farm and seed materials will be on display and sale; part of bid to popularise farming among people

title: Ranjitha’s body identified through DNA test
content: The DNA sample matched with that of her mother. The sample from her brother did not yield a match and hence samples were taken from her mother and children

title: Madras High Court orders criminal, disciplinary, and contempt proceedings against lawyer for abusing, threatening judges
content: Justice P.T. Asha orders criminal action as the lawyer had prevented the police from executing an NBW; directs Bar Council to initiate disciplinary action for his conduct in court

title: Rice exporters stare at major disruptions, payment delays amid escalating Iran-Israel conflict
content: "Nearly 10 lakh metric tonnes of Basmati rice is exported from the country to Iran, of which Haryana's share is about 30-35%," Rice Exporters Association's state unit president said, adding that shipments of about 1 lakh metric tonnes of basmati rice for Iran are stuck at ports.

title: Officials recommend new varieties of pulses seeds procured from Kanpur research institute
content: One of the greengram varieties, LGG 600, has come up well and reached the flowering stage on the 28th day with uniform growth; similarly Kota 5 variety of blackgram found more disease-resistant

title: Cabinet sub-committee approves new land allotments for six institutions, revises allocations for four previously approved entities in Amaravati
content: Two earlier land allotments have also been cancelled, Minister Narayana announced after the committee’s meeting

title: Supreme Court deprecates ‘trend’ of accused reneging on promised payment after securing bail
content: Especially in tax evasion and financial fraud cases, voluntary offers are made to deposit substantial amounts to show bona fide and secure liberty, but ‘a grievance is made before a higher court that the condition imposed for bail was onerous and illegal’

title: Questioning its merit, Bombay High Court dismisses petition seeking courts intervention in issuing Scheduled Caste certificate
content: The petitioner sought court’s direction in declaring him as a person from the ‘Chambhar’ community, claiming he has suffered discrimination and disadvantages on account of his mother belonging to Scheduled Caste community

title: New species of gecko endemic to Western Ghats discovered in Coonoor
content: Published in ‘Bionimina’, Dravidogecko coonoor is the formal name of the “...distinct population of Dravidogecko in Coonoor Hills of the Upper Nilgiris, Western Ghats, India”

title: IndiGo employee alleges casteist abuse by seniors, FIR lodged
content: IndiGo has dismissed the claims as "baseless" and said it will extend its support to the law enforcement agencies as required

title: Girl dies in bomb explosion in West Bengal’s Kaliganj even as bypoll counting under way; CM tells police to take action against culprits
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee said police will take strict legal action against the culprits

title: Pahalgam terror attack: NIA gets 5-day remand of two accused
content: According to the NIA, the arrested accused have disclosed the identities of the three armed terrorists involved in the attack, and have also confirmed that they were Pakistani nationals affiliated with LeT

title: Wildlife Institute of India issues, then withdraws order to withhold salaries of staff who skipped Yoga Day event
content: WII Director Virendra Tiwari, however, said the administration had sent a routine e-mail to the staff. "No such action is proposed," he said

title: Assembly bypoll results: People rejected both BJP and Congress, says Arvind Kejriwal after AAP’s victory
content: Celebrations erupted at the AAP headquarters in Delhi with party workers distributing laddoos to celebrate the twin victories.

title: Video clip criticising Periyar, Anna played at Lord Murugan devotees’ conference in Madurai kicks up row
content: The clipping reportedly showed leaders of Dravidian politics — Periyar, Anna, and Karunanidhi — in poor light

title: Nilambur bypoll win not UDF’s victory, says BJP leader P.K. Krishnadas
content: BJP national executive committee member says Jamaat-e-Islami benefited and that BJP saw rise in vote share

title: National Education Policy will transform India's educational landscape: V-P Dhankhar
content: Reflecting on his experience as the former Governor of West Bengal, the Vice-President said that he was closely associated with the development of this policy

title: Andhra Pradesh Government to carry out fresh study on structural stability of 125-year-old abandoned Havelock bridge across river Godavari
content: Union Minister for Tourism and Culture Gajendra Singh Shekhawat, Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan to perform Bhumi puja for Akhandra Godavari project under which the Havelock bridge will be developed into a tourist attraction

title: Congress MLA Belur Gopal Krishna suggests Minister’s resignation over allegation of corruption in allotting houses in Karnataka
content: Congress MLA said that the issue is serious as a senior legislator of the ruling party had made the allegation

title: Gujarat Assembly bypolls: AAP wins Visavadar, BJP retains Kadi seat
content: BJP leaders earlier said they were hoping to break the 18-year jinx in Visavadar, where the party last tasted victory in 2007.

title: Nilambur bypoll: Anti-government sentiment drove byelection verdict, says Syed Sadiqali Shihab Thangal
content: IUML State president describes win as ‘unanimous’ and credits it to the front’s focus on popular and relevant issues during bypoll campaign

title: Six Telangana residents return from Iran and Israel; seven more expected to reach New Delhi tonight
content: Telangana government facilitates safe arrival and onward journey of the students. They boarded flights with assistance from the State’s liaison officers.

title: Rythu Bharosa disbursement touches ₹8,284.66 crore; 67 Lakh farmers benefit from financial assistance scheme
content: Nalgonda district leads with the highest disbursement where 5.13  lakh farmers were given ₹679.19 crore

title: Lalu Prasad files nomination papers for re-election as RJD president
content: A large number of RJD workers had reached the party office to catch a glimpse of the leader, once known for his earthy but electrifying presence

title: Nilambur bypoll: UDF wrests back Assembly seat in Kerala with resounding win
content: Aryadan Shoukath secures a decisive victory in Nilambur, defeating LDF’s M. Swaraj by a substantial margin of 11,077 votes

title: 97 'anti-nationals' arrested post Pahalgam terror attack in Assam: CM Himanta Biswa
content: The arrested person from Tinsukia had shared objectionable content on Hinduism on social media, while the accused from Nagaon made a derogatory comment on Lord Ram, the CM said

title: Police nab wanted murder accused after encounter in Gwalior
content: “The accused Bunty Bhadoria sustained a bullet injury in his leg after the police fired at him in retaliation during a chase,” an official said

title: Two Srisailam temple staff suspended for ‘negligence’
content: Following complaint that the bags were kept with the cashier against norms, an internal enquiry was conducted following which action has been initiated against the two officials for their negligence.

title: Sustainability is a necessity, not a slogan anymore: President Droupadi Murmu
content: The President also said the time is over for corporate organisations to act solely with the objective of earning profits, and now they have to keep the environmental costs in mind

title: Indore-Bhubaneswar IndiGo flight delayed due to technical snag
content: Pilots of the IndiGo flight number '6E 6332' noticed a technical snag when the plane was heading towards the runway for take-off, an official said.

title: Tirupparankundram row: Madras High Court dismisses H. Raja’s plea against police notice summoning him for inquiry
content: Justice P. Velmurugan directs the BJP leader to appear before the Inspector of Subramaniapuram police in Madurai city and cooperate with the investigation

title: Don't politicise anti-Naxal operations; conduct them in transparent manner: Congress leader Sachin Pilot
content: Sachin Pilot said everyone should come together to end Naxalism not only in Chhattisgarh but also in other States which have been struggling with the menace

title: Nilambur bypoll: P.V. Anvar factor cannot be ignored, says KPCC president Sunny Joseph
content: ‘We will examine whether any UDF votes shifted to Anvar. A person who has received so many votes cannot be disregarded,’ says Sunny Joseph

title: PM Modi, BJP leaders pay tributes to Syama Prasad Mookerjee on death anniversary
content: An early champion of repealing Article 370, which granted special status to Jammu and Kashmir, Syama Prasad Mookerjee joined hands with the RSS to launch Jana Sangh in 1951

title: Odisha plans to ease forest, wildlife restrictions to boost tourism; experts call it dangerous
content: Experts say Odisha's move could allow economic interests to shape regulatory frameworks meant for ecological protection and mark a dangerous departure from India's legal and ecological commitments

title: Iran-Israel conflict: Congress asks Modi government to show moral courage and condemn U.S. bombings
content: The Modi government had ‘neither criticised nor condemned’ aggression by the U.S. and Israel, and ‘maintained a deafening silence on the genocide’ in Gaza, Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said

title: Samajwadi Party expels three MLAs for anti-party activities, deviating from core principles
content: Those expelled from the party are Abhay Singh (MLA from Gosainganj), Rakesh Pratap Singh (Gauriganj) and Manoj Kumar Pandey (Unchahar), the SP said in an official statement

title: Shahapur drinking water project to be inaugurated by Karnataka CM in August
content: Apart from Shahapur city, two villages – Ingalagi and Madnal – will also get the water from the project

title: 3,000-MW power project to come up in Dhubri or Goalpara: Himanta
content: ‘The Assam govt had mooted allocating the project to Kokrajhar so that it can reap benefits of a major investment, which is set to create one lakh direct and indirect employment opportunities,’ says CM Himanta

title: Woman kills daughter, ends life after husband transfers land to relative in Karnataka
content: Preliminary investigations indicated that Mala took the extreme step after her husband transferred 10 guntas of land to a relative after a discussion with his mother and brother

title: Seeing blue: The Isle by Wonderla is a water-themed resort on the edge of Bengaluru
content: The pet-friendly resort has tropical style cottages with jacuzzies, a spa and a lagoon that runs through the property

title: Protesting students at Haryana Agricultural University adamant on demand to remove VC
content: The protesting students have accused the VC of “brutal repression” and “suppression of rights”, claiming that he ordered lathi charge on students

title: Commuters have a harrowing time at Ernakulam Junction railway station as redevelopment works hit a dead end
content: ₹300-crore station redevelopment project hits a dead end; acute space constraints, waterlogging and undulation within the station premises cause inconvenience to passengers; steps to relocate vendors near the station sought

title: Private medical colleges in Telangana credit ₹25,000 stipend, take back ₹20,000 in cash, allege MBBS students
content: Speaking to The Hindu, interns from multiple private institutions detailed disturbing practices employed by the administrations to create an illusion of compliance.

title: Dropped from Goa Cabinet after alleging graft in CM-led dept., Gaude ratchets up attack
content: Former Minister Govind Gaude says he will not resign as MLA or quit BJP and continue to work for tribal people

title: Assembly bypoll results highlights: Congress wins Nilambur; AAP wins a seat each in Gujarat, Punjab; Trinamool bags Bengal’s Kaliganj; BJP retains Kadi in Gujarat
content: Arvind Kejriwal said in a press conference that the results of the Visavadar and Ludhiana West by-elections indicate that people are “fed up with the BJP”.

title: Claims of U.S. using Indian airspace debunked by PIB Fact Check
content: It said that the Joint Chiefs of Staff Chair Gen. Dan Caine had explained the route used by U.S. aircraft during a press briefing

title: Tripura government gives jobs to 18 next of kin of victims murdered in political violence
content: The primary consideration for recruitment is based on the financial condition of the families, but all those lost kin would also be considered in the next phases

title: Before & after: Satellite images show damage caused to Iran’s nuclear sites after US strike
content: Satellite imagery reveals substantial damage to Iran's Fordow and Natanz nuclear facilities following reported US strikes. Fordow shows impact sites and potential tunnel collapses, while Natanz has a crater above its underground enrichment area. Despite the damage, the IAEA reports no radiation releases. Isfahan nuclear research facility also targeted, but no radiation leakage reported.

title: Smoke engulfs skyline: Iranian missile hits Israel's Ashdod; IDF strikes Tehran - video
content: Tensions escalate as Iran and Israel exchange aerial attacks, with a missile striking near an Israeli power station and disrupting electricity. This follows US strikes on Iranian nuclear sites, prompting retaliation. International concern rises as the conflict widens, with calls for diplomacy and warnings about the Strait of Hormuz closure. Iran seeks support from Russia amid ongoing hostilities.

title: Assembly bypolls: AAP retains 2 seats in Punjab, Gujarat
content: Arvind Kejriwal asserted that Gujarat is weary of the BJP, highlighting AAP's Visavadar win and BJP's Kadi victory in Gujarat bypolls. He also celebrated AAP's anticipated win in Punjab's Ludhiana West, noting increased support compared to 2022.

title: Surprise: How Bill Gates, Melinda Gates reacted when daughter announced startup
content: Phoebe Gates, daughter of Bill Gates, has launched Phia, an e-commerce app co-founded with Sophia Kianni. The platform utilizes AI to compare prices across numerous websites, offering users a comprehensive view of both new and second-hand fashion items. Bill Gates initially expressed concern about potential financial requests and involvement but ultimately supported Phoebe's entrepreneurial endeavor.

title: India vs England Test: 'Itna tameez se khelne ke chakkar mein ... ' - Rishabh Pant's complaint to KL Rahul
content: Rishabh Pant, known for aggressive batting, was heard on the stump mic advising himself to stay calm during the first Test's Day 4 against England. Pant's remarks to KL Rahul about defensive play were also captured.

title: 'Can’t kill my father, so I’m ending my life': Haryana man harassed by wife and her lover
content: Magan alias Ajay, a resident of Rohtak, tragically ended his life due to alleged harassment by his wife, Divya, and her boyfriend, Deepak, a police officer. Magan accused them of mental torture, demanding money, and pressuring him to commit heinous acts.

title: Kaliganj bypoll: Bomb blast rocks Nadia during vote counting; 9-year-old girl dies
content: A tragic incident occurred in West Bengal's Nadia district where a nine-year-old girl died in a bomb explosion in Barochandgar. The explosion took place during the Kaliganj assembly bypoll counting. Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee expressed shock and grief, assuring strict legal action against the culprits.

title: Elon Musk’s simple life: World’s richest says will never own 5 things
content: Elon Musk, despite his immense wealth, maintains a surprisingly minimalist lifestyle. He sold numerous properties, opting for a small Boxabl home and even crashing at friends' places. Musk once lived on $1 a day and famously crashed a McLaren, never replacing it, showcasing his detachment from luxury possessions and focus on his ventures.

title: UP shocker: Jilted lover shoots girlfriend dead, kills self in Kannauj
content: In Kannauj, Devansh killed Deepti over her arranged marriage. He shot her at her home in Sultanpur village. A village meeting had occurred before the murder. Devansh then killed himself near a pond. The police found his body with his father's licensed gun. Deepti's family had arranged her marriage to someone else.

title: 'We don't want to raise brats': Anushka on parenting with Kohli
content: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli, admired for their parenting, prioritise a balanced upbringing for their children, Vamika and Akaay. Anushka emphasized in an old interview the importance of love, respect, and shared responsibilities within the family unit. The couple aims to shield their children from social media's glare, allowing them to choose their online presence later.

title: Wake-up call for US: Elon Musk echoes brother on Trump’s ‘Big Beautiful Bill’
content: Elon Musk warns that China's solar power generation is rapidly expanding, potentially exceeding the entire US electricity output within four years. This concern follows Kimbal Musk's criticism of a proposed bill, arguing it would cripple the US renewable energy sector and jeopardize American energy independence, forcing reliance on natural gas.

title: 'Zabardasti try kar raha': Pant's self-talk on stump mic goes viral- WATCH
content: Rishabh Pant's on-stump mic self-talk in Hindi revealed his struggle to balance aggression and composure during his innings. He advised himself to play straight and avoid unnecessary risks, as translated by Dinesh Karthik. Despite a first-innings century, Pant seemed caught between his natural game and restraint.

title: Iran-Israel conflict: India's 1,00,000 tonnes basmati exports to Iran stranded
content: Approximately 100,000 tonnes of basmati rice destined for Iran are stuck at Indian ports due to the Israel-Iran conflict, impacting India's exports. This accounts for 18-20% of total basmati exports to Iran, causing shipping and insurance disruptions.

title: IND vs ENG: Oh no! Shubman Gill in shock as stumps go flying - WATCH
content: Shubman Gill's impressive innings of 147 was cut short on Day 4 of the first Test against England, as he was dismissed by Brydon Carse. Gill, who is captaining India in Tests for the first time, had led India's charge with his century.

title: 'Not the one to get scared': Tej Pratap on being expelled from RJD
content: Tej Pratap Yadav, son of Lalu Prasad Yadav, announced plans to pursue legal action following his expulsion from the RJD, alleging a conspiracy by party members. He vowed to expose the individuals responsible and seek justice from the public. Citing a threat to his life, he requested increased security from the Bihar government.

title: ‘Tell the truth!’: Meghan Markle's three-word grenade at Buckingham Palace
content: Amidst royal celebrations, Meghan Markle's podcast appearance ignited a media storm. She urged people to "tell the truth," reigniting tensions with the palace. This follows the Sussexes' established pattern of revealing personal narratives and facing scrutiny. Serena Williams' advice, "A lie can’t live forever," underscores Meghan's approach.

title: IND vs ENG: 'Let the boy play' - Ex-England cricketer's advice to Gambhir
content: Former England pacer Steve Harmison urged India's coach, likely Gautam Gambhir, to avoid interfering with Rishabh Pant's natural, aggressive batting style. Harmison highlighted Pant's six-hitting prowess and unpredictable yet controlled innings. He emphasized that Pant's unique character and fearless approach are vital for cricket, making the game more exciting and captivating for fans.

title: Adin Ross returns with Brand Risk 008: Date, full fight card revealed
content: Adin Ross is set to host Brand Risk 008 in Nashville on June 22, 2025, featuring a main event between Charleston White and Kodiyakredd. The event, streamed live on Kick, includes nine influencer matchups with personalities like Scam Likely, Julian Newman, and Supreme Patty. Following a chaotic Brand Risk 007, expect more drama and unexpected moments.

title: 'She's heartbroken': Blake Lively breaks down as Taylor Swift cuts ties
content: The friendship between Blake Lively and Taylor Swift has ended. Sources say Lively is heartbroken after Swift cut ties. Legal issues involving Justin Baldoni's case add complexity. Lively must submit texts with Swift. Rumors suggest Lively tried to leverage her Swift connection. Travis Kelce supports Swift during this difficult time. Swift's upcoming album may reflect themes of betrayal.

title: Israel pounds Iran: Airfields bombed to rubble; jets annihilated - video
content: Israel's military confirmed conducting coordinated airstrikes on six Iranian airbases, significantly impairing Iran's aerial operations amidst escalating hostilities. The strikes targeted key military infrastructure, including runways and fighter jets, while Israeli jets also struck missile launch sites. These actions follow coordinated operations by Israel and the US against Iran's nuclear and missile facilities, with claims of substantial damage inflicted.

title: 'She seems in pain or drunk ?' Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce spotted in New York
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce were spotted enjoying a stylish date night in New York City, just before Kelce's NFL season begins. The couple, known for their coordinated looks, were seen holding hands and sharing affectionate moments. With Swift's tour schedule wrapped up, she looks forward to supporting Kelce during the upcoming season.

title: Uttarakhand landslide caught on cam: Rocks, mud collapse onto Badrinath highway; traffic hit
content: Heavy rainfall triggered a significant landslide near Bhanerpani, Pipalkoti, blocking the Badrinath National Highway. Chamoli Police are working to clear the debris, but continuous rockfalls are hindering progress. Authorities advise travelers to postpone their journeys until the route is safe. Emergency helpline numbers have been issued for assistance, as efforts continue to restore traffic flow.

title: 'Worst announcer in NBA history': Fans tear down ESPN commentator Doris Burke
content: Doris Burke, a prominent ESPN commentator, faced severe criticism following her analysis during Game 7 of the 2025 NBA Finals between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Indiana Pacers. Frustrated fans took to social media, with some even labeling her the 'worst commentator' in NBA history.

title: Health: Best exercise for heart, according to top US cardiac surgeon
content: Doctor Jeremy London suggests aerobic exercises for a healthy heart. Regular physical activity strengthens the heart muscle. It lowers the risk of heart diseases and improves blood circulation. Running, cycling, and swimming are beneficial. The American Heart Association recommends 150 minutes of moderate-intensity activity per week. Identify and target your weakest health habits for overall well-being.

title: Watch: Bengals’ Ja’Marr Chase harassed on flight for saying no to autograph
content: Ja'Marr Chase, the Bengals wide receiver, faced an uncomfortable situation on a flight when a fan, denied an autograph, loudly revealed his identity to the cabin. The incident sparked widespread support for Chase online, with many criticizing the fan's entitled behavior and praising Chase's calm response. This event highlights the importance of respecting personal boundaries, even with celebrities.

title: Science: SpaceX to launch 150 capsules of ashes and DNA into space
content: SpaceX is set to launch over 150 capsules containing cremated remains and DNA into low Earth orbit on June 23, in collaboration with Celestis and The Exploration Company (TEC). This 'Perseverance Flight' offers families a unique way to memorialize loved ones by sending them on a symbolic journey into space.

title: IND vs ENG: 'It has spun...' - Ex-England cricketer on Headingley Test
content: Ahead of day four of the first Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy Test, Stuart Broad suggests India holds a slight advantage over England. Despite Ollie Pope's century and Harry Brook's near-century, Jasprit Bumrah's five-wicket haul gave India a narrow lead. KL Rahul's steady innings further extended it.

title: Mishap averted: Iron grill on track halts Gorakhpur-Humsafar Express
content: Averted disaster struck early Sunday as the Humsafar Express hit an iron grill deliberately placed on the tracks near Lucknow, marking the eighth sabotage attempt in Uttar Pradesh since last year. Gomti Nagar police have filed an FIR against unknown individuals under the Railway Act.

title: IND vs ENG: 'As valuable as a Kohinoor...' - Former cricketer on Bumrah
content: Dinesh Karthik has lauded Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional performance in the first Test against England, calling him a "Kohinoor diamond." Karthik emphasized Bumrah's versatility and intelligence, highlighting his ability to deliver with any ball and his knack for understanding batsmen. He suggested a special contract for Bumrah, deeming him a "national treasure" and crucial to India's bowling attack across all formats.

title: 'Sitaare Zameen Par' collection: Aamir Khan starrer begins Monday on a decent note
content: Aamir Khan's 'Sitaare Zameen Par,' also starring Genelia D'souza, exceeded expectations, earning ₹10.7 crore on its opening day. The film experienced substantial growth over the weekend, with collections doubling on Saturday and further increasing on Sunday, driven by positive word-of-mouth. By Monday afternoon, the film had grossed ₹59.66 crore, indicating a strong start despite a weekday dip.

title: IND vs ENG: 'Two brilliant...' - Ex-cricketer compares Bumrah to Warne
content: Nasser Hussain lauded Jasprit Bumrah's bowling prowess, drawing comparisons to the legendary Shane Warne. He emphasized Bumrah's unique skill and expressed hope for his continued fitness. Bumrah's impressive five-wicket haul in the first innings left Hussain spellbound, predicting he would be a significant threat to England.

title: Delhi to mandate 6+ age for Class 1 from 2026; DoE orders pre-primary restructuring
content: The Delhi Directorate of Education has mandated a uniform minimum age of six years for Class 1 admissions from the 2026–27 session, restructuring the foundational stage to include three years of pre-primary learning. Applicable to all recognised schools, the move aligns with NEP 2020 and aims to ensure age-appropriate entry into formal schooling.

title: Nightmare scenario: How Iran, hit by US, may choke world’s oil supply - explained
content: Iran-Israel war: Amidst rising tensions, concerns escalate over potential disruptions to global oil supply via the Strait of Hormuz. While a prolonged blockade remains unlikely, even brief closures could trigger significant price surges and economic instability. Iran's strategic position offers various retaliatory options, yet faces constraints including potential counterstrikes and disapproval from key allies like China.

title: IND vs ENG: 'I just...' - Jasprit Bumrah explains his mantra
content: Despite multiple dropped catches off his bowling in the Leeds Test, Jasprit Bumrah maintained a positive attitude, explaining that he plays cricket to enjoy himself. He took five wickets in England's first innings and displayed understanding towards the fielders, attributing the dropped chances to challenging weather conditions.

title: IND vs ENG: 'Hope he gets,' Ganguly identifies how India can stay alive in the series
content: Sourav Ganguly has urged fellow Indian pacers to support Jasprit Bumrah in the ongoing Test series against England. Ganguly emphasised Bumrah's adaptability across formats but noted the lack of support from other bowlers like Shardul Thakur, Prasidh Krishna, and Mohammed Siraj.

title: NIFTEE 2025 Final Results Out: scorecards now live on exams.nta.ac.in; download your scorecard today
content: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the final results of the NIFT Entrance Examination 2025 for UG and PG design courses. Candidates can access their scorecards at exams.nta.ac.in/NIFT using their Application Number and Date of Birth. The two-stage selection process included GAT, CAT, hands-on tests, and interviews. Admissions will proceed based on final merit lists.

title: Decoy plan, 125 planes: How US carried out largest B-2 strike in history
content: Under Operation Midnight Hammer, American stealth bombers executed a surprise strike on Iran's underground nuclear facilities. Seven B-2 Spirit bombers flew from Missouri, dropping bunker-buster bombs on key sites like Fordow, Natanz, and Isfahan. The mission aimed to cripple Iran's uranium enrichment program, with US officials hailing it as a major success, despite Iran's denial and vow to retaliate.

title: IND vs ENG: Bumrah's wife shares adorable photo of son - see pic
content: Sanjana Ganesan, Jasprit Bumrah's wife, shared an Instagram story featuring a child, presumably their son Angad, holding a cricket ball marked with Bumrah's impressive figures from the first Test against England. Bumrah's stellar performance at Headingley saw him claim a five-wicket haul, finishing with 5/83, despite India's mixed bowling performance and dropped catches.

title: DGCA starts inspection of Air India's main hub; surveillance planned before crash: Officials
content: The Directorate General of Civil Aviation will assess Air India's Gurugram facility. This evaluation will check aircraft documents and crew records. It is a standard yearly activity, not a response to the Ahmedabad crash.

title: Man who lost 2 loved ones in air crashes years apart; in 1988, then daughter in AI plane crash
content: Ahmedabad businessman Saurin Palkhiwala faces tragedy again with the Air India Flight 171 crash, losing his 26-year-old daughter, Sanjana. He tragically recalls a similar loss in 1988. Sanjana, born after 14 years of marriage, was a bright BBA and NYU graduate, traveling to the UK for a reunion.

title: Kaavia James dances to Bollywood hit; fans call it ‘cutest moment’ - video
content: A delightful Instagram video of Kaavia James, daughter of Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union, has captured hearts globally. The six-year-old is seen joyfully dancing to the Bollywood hit “What Jhumka?” while dressed in a traditional white lehenga. The heartwarming clip, posted by her parents, celebrates cultural exploration and youthful exuberance.

title: Request Congress Workers To Join AAP: Arvind Kejriwal On Gujarat Bypoll Win
content: Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) chief Arvind Kejriwal on Monday hailed the party's performance in the Gujarat and Punjab bypolls, calling them a "semi-final to 2027" and a clear sign that voters would reject both the BJP and the Congress.

title: Is Delhi Monsoon Ready? 445 Trouble Spots Raise Alarm
content: Monsoon clouds looming overhead, Delhi is bracing for another season of waterlogged roads and traffic snarls. This year though, the threat could be bigger than before.

title: Ghost Of GBU-28: When US Bunker-Buster Bomb Shattered Saddam's Last Hope
content: American air power has been deployed several times to "establish democracy" and fight terrorism in the Middle East. In 1990, when Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait, the US launched Operation Desert Storm to fight the Iraqi forces.

title: Assembly Bypoll Result 2025 Updates: BJP, AAP Win 1 Seat Each In Gujarat, Congress Wins In Kerala
content: The Assembly bypolls were held for two seats in Gujarat's Visavadar and Kadi, and one each in Kerala's Nilambur, Punjab's Ludhiana West, and West Bengal's Kaliganj.

title: From Congress To AAP: A Political Shift In Gujarat's Visavadar
content: Visavadar, a seat long held or closely contested by the Congress, delivered a verdict in the 2025 bypoll by electing Aam Aadmi Party's Gopal Italia, a result which encapsulates the crumbling of old allegiances and the emergence of new political aspir

title: Jagan Reddy's 'No Z+ Security' Charge After Row Over Car Running Over Man
content: Former Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister and YSRCP chief YS Jagan Mohan Reddy has strongly criticised Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu, accusing him of degrading the standards of politics in Andhra Pradesh.

title: Iran Missile Misses Car. Israel Uses Dashcam Video To Educate Citizens
content: The conflict drags on. On Monday, Iran fired missiles that sent Israelis to huddle in shelters. A video emerged on social media showing the moment an Iranian missile hit Israel's Ashdod city as the war entered the 11th day.

title: Iran's Nuclear Site At Fordow Significantly Damaged: IAEA Chief
content: US bombing probably caused "very significant" damage to the underground areas of Iran's Fordow uranium enrichment plant dug into a mountain, though no one can yet tell the extent, UN nuclear watchdog chief Rafael Grossi said.

title: UK Health Secretary Orders Probe Into Maternity Services After Scandals
content: UK Health Secretary Wes Streeting announced a "rapid national investigation" into English maternity services after a string of scandals over 15 years.

title: Hungary Pride March Wins Backing Of Some Foreign Embassies, But Not US
content: Britain, France and Germany and 30 other countries expressed support for Hungary's LGBTQ community and a Budapest Pride march on June 28.

title: China Warns Of 'Spillover Of War' Risk In Iran-Israel Conflict
content: China urged Iran and Israel to de-escalate in order to prevent the "spillover" of their war, as fighting between the two foes raged for the 11th day.

title: Britain's Reform Party Makes 'Britannia Card' Policy To Appease The Rich
content: Britain's populist Reform UK party unveiled plans to offer wealthy, often foreign newcomers a "Britannia Card" to gain exemption from tax on international wealth, income or gains for 10 years for a one-off payment.

title: On CCTV, Woman Sexually Harassed Near Bengaluru, Thrashed By Group Of Men
content: A woman was allegedly sexually harassed, beaten up, and abused in full public view near Bengaluru on Sunday. The disturbing incident was captured on a CCTV camera.

title: Succession Plans For Iran's Khamenei Hit Top Gear
content: The clock's ticking for senior clerics seeking a successor to Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

title: Opinion: Opinion | The Latest G7 Was A Disaster, Thanks To Trump
content: With the deep differences between the US and the other six members from Trump's first term getting accentuated after his re-election, the prognostics for this summit were, in any case, not good.

title: Ayatollah Khamenei Asks Putin To Do More For Iran After US Air Strikes
content: Iran's Supreme Leader sent his foreign minister to Moscow on Monday to ask President Vladimir Putin for more help from Russia after the biggest US military action against the Islamic Republic since the 1979 revolution over the weekend.

title: Israeli Strike On Iran's Evin Jail 'Irresponsible': French Prisoner's Sister
content: An Israeli strike on Evin prison in Tehran is completely irresponsible and puts prisoners "in mortal danger", said Noemie Kohler, the sister of French national Cecile Kohler who is jailed there.

title: Greenpeace Amongst Protestors Against Jeff Bezos-Sanchez's Venice Wedding
content: Global environmental lobby Greenpeace added its voice to protests against this week's celebrity wedding in Venice between American tech billionaire Jeff Bezos and journalist Laura Sanchez.

title: LSU's latest MCWS title makes the Tigers college baseball's best of all time
content: the LSU Tigers beat Coastal Carolina with a big double play to take home the men's college world series . the title they really won was that of Greatest Ever College Baseball Program . "when we go to work every day, we do it trying to make the Tigers that came before us proud," says a designated hitter .

title: Thunder and Pacers' biggest summer priorities, plus guides for every NBA team
